issue.title: [GLib] Enable gtk-doc on Travis CI Mac environment
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current build script for Travis CI (`ci/travis_before_script_c_glib.sh`) does not use `--enable-gtk-doc` option on Mac. Now it can be used also on Mac, so it should be enabled to check build status.
